title: Being Binah
description: Tired of being “the nice one,” who is always taken for granted, Binah is ready to try being something – or someone – new. But how will the new and maybe-not-so-improved Binah fit in with the English Roses? And with a certain someone – her latest crush, Ben – who might have liked the old Binah a little bit more than he’d let on? Can her friends prove just how wonderful the real Binah is before “the nice one” is gone…for good?
author: Madonna
